SEARCH
Package managers

Class PatientManager

java.lang.Object
managers.UserManager
managers.PatientManager
public class PatientManager extends UserManager
The PatientManager class manages the creation, updating and handling of patient records. It uses the PatientFileHandler to read, update and store patient data in a CSV file. The class handles the conversion between raw data (from CSV) and Patient objects as well as updating various patient details such as contact information, diagnoses, treatments and prescriptions.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public User createUser(String id)
      Creates a {code Patient} object from the provided pateint ID by reading the associated record from the CSV file. The method parses the relevant details such as name, date of birth, gender, contact information, blood type, diagnoses, treatments and prescriptions
      Specified by:
      createUser in class UserManager
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient
      Returns:
      A Patient object with the corresponding data, or null if any error occurs

    • createRecordFromUser

      public String[] createRecordFromUser(User user)
      Converts a Patient object into a record array format suitable for storage in the CSV file. The method converts all attributes to their corresponding string formats, inclduing formatting the date of birth and converting enum values into strings
      Specified by:
      createRecordFromUser in class UserManager
      Parameters:
      user - the User object (must be an instance of Patient).
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the patient's record.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided user is npt a Patient.

    • updatePatientPhone

      public Patient updatePatientPhone(String patientID, int newPhone)
      Updates the phone number for a petient with the specified ID. The patient's record is updated with the new phone number in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient
      newPhone - The new phone number to update
      Returns:
      The updated Patient object, or null if the patient cannot be found.

    • updatePatientEmail

      public Patient updatePatientEmail(String patientID, String newEmail)
      Updates the email address for a patient with the specified ID. The patient's record is updated with the new email in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      newEmail - The new email address to update.
      Returns:
      The updaated Patient object, or null if the patient is not found.

    • updateDiagnoses

      public Patient updateDiagnoses(String patientID, List<String> newDiagnoses)

      Parameters:
